text: Public transport apps are gold - always have backups for when weather goes rogue!
Ever tried dodging trams? It’s art!
Urban plans help but don’t overlook booming populations straining roads!
Chaperoning school dances was oddly affirming – felt truly responsible!
Chalk-dusted cardigans and endless patience? Try juggling data with teenage angst during lunch duty!
The "always stern with no-nonsense" tag gets thrown at my role plenty! Trust me, though, wrangling a playground of kiddos needs as much creativity as it does order – sometimes more!
Definitely feels like you're never entirely "off duty" — risk assessments become second nature. And good luck not thinking in learning outcomes after dealing with curriculum planning daily!

Felt that shift too! Beyond just work & relationships, suddenly there's all these wellness goals - gotta stay fit but also chill enough not to stress eat? It's like juggling avocado toast on a unicycle sometimes!
